S06sspp2_1u:14: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:15_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pṛthivīdhātvasattāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:15_1: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:15_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā pṛthivīdhātvasattānyā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatānyā pṛthivīdhātuviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:15_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasattā yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:15_5: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuviviktatā yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:15_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:16: abdhātvasattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abdhātuśūnyatayā pūrvāntano bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:26: abdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:27_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābdhātvasattāyām abdhātuśūnyatāyām abdhātuviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:27_1: abdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:27_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābdhātvasattā
S06sspp2_1u:27_4: yā cābdhātuśūnyatā yā cābdhātuviviktatā yā cābdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:27_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:40_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tejodhātvasattāyāṃ tejodhātuśūnyatāyāṃ tejodhātuviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:40_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:53_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:79_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānadhātvasattāyāṃ vijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānadhātuviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:92_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāvidyāsattāyām avidyāśūnyatāyām avidyāviviktatāyām avidyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:157_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sparśāsattāyāṃ ca sparśaśūnyatāyāṃ sparśaviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:182: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:183_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tṛṣṇāsattāyāṃ ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:183_1: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:196_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputropādānāsattāyām upādānaśūnyatāyām upādānaviviktatāyām

S06sspp2_1u:209_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:221: jātyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:222_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jātyasattāyāṃ ca jātiśūnyatāyāṃ jātiviviktatāyāṃ jātyasvabhāvatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:222_5: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:247: dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:248_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitāsattāyāṃ dānapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_11]

S06sspp2_1u:501_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyānupalambhaśūnyatāsattānyānupalambhaśūnyatāśūnyatānyānupalambhaśūnyatāviviktatānyānupalambhaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:501_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:501_4: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsattā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:501_5: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:501_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:509: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvaśūnyatāsattayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:512: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:513_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:513_1: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:513_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:513_4: yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:513_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:522: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:523_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra svabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:523_1: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:523_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:523_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:523_5: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:523_6: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:534: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:535_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:535_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:535_4: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:535_5: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:535_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad [ŚsP_II-1_25] advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:547: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:548_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:548_1: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:548_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā smṛtyupasthānāsattānyā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatānyā smṛtyupasthānaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:548_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā yā ca smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:548_5: yā ca smṛtyupasthānaviviktatā yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:548_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:560: samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:561_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samyakprahāṇāsattāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaśūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:561_2: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā samyakprahāṇāsattānyā samyakprahāṇaśūnyatānyā samyakprahāṇaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:561_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samyakprahāṇāsattā yā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:561_5: yā ca samyakprahāṇaviviktatā yā ca samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:561_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:568: ṛddhipādaviviktatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:572: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:573_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrarddhipādāsattāyām ṛddhipādaśūnyatāyām ṛddhipādaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:573_1: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:573_2: na cānyā ṛddhipādāsattānyā ṛddhipādaśūnyatānyā ṛddhipādaviviktatānyā ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:573_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:573_4: yā carddhipādāsattā yā carddhipādaśūnyatā yā carddhipādaviviktatā yā carddhipādāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:573_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:585: indriyāsvabhāvatayā [ŚsP_II-1_27] madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:586_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrendriyāsattāyām indriyaśūnyatāyām indriyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:586_1: indriyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:586_2: na cānyā indriyāsattānyā indriyaśūnyatānyā indriyaviviktatānyā indriyāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:586_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:586_4: yā cendriyāsattā yā cendriyaśūnyatā yā cendriyaviviktatā yā cendriyāsvabhāvatā yaś
S06sspp2_1u:586_5: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:598: balāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:599_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra balāsattāyāṃ balaśūnyatāyāṃ balaviviktatāyāṃ balāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:599_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā balāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:599_3: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca balāsattā yā ca balaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:599_4: yā ca balaviviktatā yā ca balāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:599_5: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:611: bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. [ŚsP_II-1_28] tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:612_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhyaṅgāsattāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:612_1: bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:612_2: na cānyā bodhyaṅgāsattānyā bodhyaṅgaśūnyatānyā bodhyaṅgaviviktatānyā bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:612_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:612_4: yā ca bodhyaṅgāsattā yā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā yā ca bodhyaṅgaviviktatā yā ca bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:612_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:624: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:625_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:625_1: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:625_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:625_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattā yā cāryaṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:625_5: yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatā yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:625_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:637: āryasatyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:638_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāryasatyāsattāyām āryasatyaśūnyatāyām āryasatyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:638_1: āryasatyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:638_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:638_4: yā cāryasatyāsattā yā cāryasatyaśūnyatā yā cāryasatyaviviktatā yā cāryasatyāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:638_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:650: dhyānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:651_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānāsattāyāṃ dhyānaśūnyatāyāṃ dhyānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:651_1: dhyānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:651_2: na cānyā dhyānāsattānyā dhyānaśūnyatānyā dhyānaviviktatānyā dhyānāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:651_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dhyānāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:651_4: yā ca dhyānaśūnyatā yā ca dhyānaviviktatā yā ca dhyānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:651_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:663: apramāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:664_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāpramāṇāsattāyām apramāṇaśūnyatāyām apramāṇaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:664_1: apramāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:664_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāpramāṇāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:664_4: yā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā yā cāpramāṇaviviktatā yā cāpramāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:664_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:676: ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:677_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrārūpyasamāpattyasattāyām ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatāyām ārūpyasamāpatti
S06sspp2_1u:677_1: viviktatāyām ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:677_2: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā ārūpyasamāpattyasattānyā ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:677_4: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cārūpyasamāpattyasattā
S06sspp2_1u:677_5: yā cārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cārūpyasamāpattiviviktatā [ŚsP_II-1_31] yā cārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:677_6: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:679: vimokṣaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. vimokṣaviviktatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:688: vimokṣāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:689_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vimokṣāsattāyāṃ vimokṣaśūnyatāyāṃ vimokṣaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:689_1: vimokṣāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:689_2: na cānyā vimokṣāsattānyā vimokṣaśūnyatānyā vimokṣaviviktatānyā vimokṣāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:689_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:689_4: yā ca vimokṣāsattā yā ca vimokṣaśūnyatā yā ca vimokṣaviviktatā yā ca vimokṣāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:689_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:701: anupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:702_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:702_4: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasattā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:702_5: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:702_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:714: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:715_2: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:715_5: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:715_8: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:727: abhijñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:728_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhijñāsattāyām abhijñāśūnyatāyām abhijñāviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:728_1: abhijñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:728_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābhijñāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:728_4: yā cābhijñāśūnyatā yā cābhijñāviviktatā yā cābhijñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:728_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:740: samādhyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:741_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samādhyasattāyāṃ samādhiśūnyatāyāṃ samādhiviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:741_1: samādhyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:924: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:928: kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:929_0: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:929_1: na madhyam upalabhyate. anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti nāma vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:929_2: chāradvatīputra na rūpasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:929_3: upalabhyate rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:931: kena kāraṇena vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. vedanā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:932: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:934_1: na madhyam upalabhyate vedanāśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:947: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃskāraśūnyatām upādāya,

S06sspp2_1u:951: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:955: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.

S06sspp2_1u:1697: pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1698: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1700: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratisaṃvidāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate pratisaṃvidśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:1701: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pratisaṃvidaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1705: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1707: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra mahākaruṇānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate mahākaruṇāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:1708: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa [ŚsP_II-1_69] mahākaruṇāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1711: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1712: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1714: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāveṇikabuddhadharmānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1716: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇāveṇikabuddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1717: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1718: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1719: kena kāraṇena vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1720: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1721: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1722: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1723: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1724: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1725: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1726: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1727: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃjñā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1728: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1729: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1730: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1731: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1732: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1734: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1735: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1736: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1737: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1738: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1739: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1740: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1741: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrādhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1742: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1743: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1744: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1745: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1746: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1747: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1748: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1749: mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1750: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1751: paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1752: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1753: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1754: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1756: na hi śūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1758: na hi śūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1760: na hi śūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1762: na hi śūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1763: prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1764: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1765: sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatayā [ŚsP_II-1_71] śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1766: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1767: svalakṣanaśūnyatā svalakṣanaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1768: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣanaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1770: na hi śūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1772: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1773: bhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1774: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1776: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1777: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1778: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1779: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1780: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1781: na hi śūnyatāyām indriyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1782: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ balāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1783: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1784: na hi śūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1785: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ āryasatyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1786: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1787: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ apramāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1788: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. aṣṭau vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1789: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1790_0: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na [ŚsP_II-1_72] bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1790_1: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣa mukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1791: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1792: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1793: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1794: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatabalāni tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1795: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgatabalāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1796: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1797: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1798: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1799: na hi śūnyatāyām āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1800: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathatā tathatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1801: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1802: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. acintyadhātur acintyadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1803: na hi śūnyatāyām acintyadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1804: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1805: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1806: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1807: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1808: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1809: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ buddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ. tat [ŚsP_II-1_73] kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1810: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1811: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatas tathāgatena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1812: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgataḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1813: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1814: vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1815: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1816: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1817: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1818: yad apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evam āha kena kāraṇena vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1819: evam āha sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalambhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ vadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S06sspp2_1u:1820: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1833: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1837: cakṣuḥ śrotraś ca ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1870: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānañ ca ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1887: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1890: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1893: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1920: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuś ca tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1922: tejodhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātāv abdhātau ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1923: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1926: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1929: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1937: avidyā saṃskārāś ca vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1939: vijñānam avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1972: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1975: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1978: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1982: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1992: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1995: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1998: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2041: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2043: ṛddhipādāḥ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2061: āryasatyāni dhyānāni cāpramāṇeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2063: apramāṇāny āryasatyeṣu dhyāneṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2090: tathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni ca pratisaṃvitsu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2101: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāś ca srotaāpattidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2104: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭakadharmāḥ srotaāpattidharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2107: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhattvadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2110: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2113: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2121: pṛthagjanabhūmir gotrabhūmiś cāṣṭamakabhūmau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2149: sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2156: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī cānāgāmini na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2158: anāgāmī srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmini ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2178: avavādānuśāsanī bodhisattvaprajñāpāramitayor na saṃvidyate nopa labhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2179: evam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhamāneṣu bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2180: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2182: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2183: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2184: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2185: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2186: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2187: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2188: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2189: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2190: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2191: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2192: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2193: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2194: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2195: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2196: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2197: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2198: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2199: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2200_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:2200_1: iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa [ŚsP_II-1_92] iti kāyasaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:2201: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2202: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2203: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2204_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
S06sspp2_1u:2205: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2206_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2206_1: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2206_2: na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2207: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2208: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur iti vijñānadhātur iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2209: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2210: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2211: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2212_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
S06sspp2_1u:2212_1: iti vijñānam iti nāmarūpam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti sparśam iti vedaneti tṛṣṇety upādānam
S06sspp2_1u:2212_2: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2213: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2214_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:2214_1: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo
S06sspp2_1u:2214_2: na sā jātir na taj jarāmaraṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2215: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ na nāma svabhāvena [ŚsP_II-1_93] yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2216: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2217: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2218: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2219: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā na ca nāmni śīlapāramitā na ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2220: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śīlapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2221: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2222: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta kṣāntipāramitā na ca nāmni kṣāntipāramitā na ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2223: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca kṣāntipāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2224: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2225: namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2226: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2227: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2228: namadheyamātram etad yad uta dhyānapāramitā na ca nāmni dhyānapāramitā na ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2229: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dhyānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2230: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2231: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2232: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2233: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2234: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2235: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2236: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2237: namadheyamātram etad yad uta bahirdhāśūnyatā na ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_94] nāma na ca nāmni bahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2238: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2239: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2240: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2241: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2242: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2243: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śūnyatāśūnyatā na ca śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni śūnyatāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2244: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2245: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2246: namadheyamātram etad yad uta mahāśūnyatā na ca mahāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2247: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2248: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2249: namadheyamātram etad yad uta paramārthaśūnyatā na ca paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni paramārthaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2250: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2251: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2252: namadheyamātram etad yad uta saṃskṛtaśūnyatā na ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni saṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2253: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2254: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2255: namadheyamātram etad yad utāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā na cāsaṃskṛtasunyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2256: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cāsaṃskṛtaśunyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2257: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2258: namadheyamātram etad yad utātyantaśūnyatā na cātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny atyantaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2259: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cātyantaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2260: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2261: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utānavarāgraśūnyatā na cānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavarāgraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2262: tathā [ŚsP_II-1_95] hi yac ca nāma yā cānavarāgraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2263: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2264: namadheyamātram etad yad utānavakāraśūnyatā na cānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavakāraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2265: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānavakāraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2266: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2267: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prakṛtiśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2268: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2269: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2270: namadheyamātram etad yad uta sarvadharmaśūnyatā na ca sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvadharmaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2271: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2272: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2273: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2274: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2275: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2276: namadheyamātram etad yad utānupalambhaśūnyatā na cānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anupalambhaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2277: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānupalambhaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2278: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2279: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvaśūnyatā na cābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2280: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2281: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2282: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatā na ca svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2283: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:3921: dānapāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3927: adhyātmaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3945: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtāṇi na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3946: samyakprahāṇāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3948: indriyāṇy asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3949: balāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3951: āryāṣṭāṇgo mārgo 'saṃskṛto na ca kasyacid vigamena. āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3952: dhyānāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3953: apramāṇāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3955: aṣṭau vimokṣāsaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3957: śūnyatānimittāpranihitavimokṣamukhāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3958: abhijñā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3960: dhāraṇīmukhāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3961: daśatathāgatabalāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3962: catvāri vaiśāradyāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3963: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'saṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3964: mahāmaitry asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3966: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3967: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yad asaṃskṛtaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena.
S06sspp2_1u:3968: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭasthā avināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:3969: āha: kim ity āyuṣman subhūte 'kūṭasthā avināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3970: subhūtir āha: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3971: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, vedanākūṭasthāvināśinī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3972: [ŚsP_II-1_142] prakṛtir asyaiṣā, saṃjñākūṭasthāvināśinī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3973: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, saṃskārā akūṭasthā avināśinaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3974: prakṛtir eṣām iyaṃ, vijñānam akūtastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā.
S06sspp2_1u:3975: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3976: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, śrotram akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3977: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, ghrāṇam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3978: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, jihvākūṭasthāvināśinī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3979: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, kāyo 'kūṭastho 'vināśī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3980: prakṛtir asyaiṣā, mano 'kūtastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā.
S06sspp2_1u:3981: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3982: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. śabdo 'kūṭastho 'vināśī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3983: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. gandho 'kūṭastho 'vināśī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3984: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. raso 'kūṭastho 'vināśī. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:3989: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. śrotravijñānam akūtastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3990: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. ghrāṇavijñānam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:3992: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. kāyavijñānam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3993: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. manovijñānam akūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā.

S06sspp2_1u:3995: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. śrotrasaṃsparśo 'kūṭastho 'vināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:3999: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. manaḥsaṃsparśo 'kūtastho 'vināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā.
S06sspp2_1u:4005: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanākūṭasthāvināśinī. tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā.

S06sspp2_1u:4204: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpam anabhinirvṛttaṃ vedanānabhinirvṛttā saṃjñānabhinirvṛttā saṃskārā anabhinirvṛttā vijñānam anabhinirvṛttam.
S06sspp2_1u:4206: kena kāraṇenāyuṣmañ subhūte yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4210: yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad vijñānam iti vadasi?
S06sspp2_1u:4211: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4212: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4213: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4214: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃjñā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4215_0: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā
S06sspp2_1u:4215_1: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:4215_2: prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4216: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4217: cakṣuḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4218: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotraṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4219: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4220: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4221: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4222: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4223: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4224: rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4225: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śabdaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4226: yasya notpādo [ŚsP_II-1_150] na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. gandhaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4227: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. rasaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4228: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4229: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4230: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4231: cakṣurvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4232: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotravijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4233: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4234: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4235: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4236: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manovijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4237: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4238: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4239: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4240: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4241: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4242: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4243: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4244: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4245: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4246: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ [ŚsP_II-1_151] prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4247: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4248: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4249: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4250: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4251: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4252: pṛthivīdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4253: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. abdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4254: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tejodhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4255: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vāyudhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4256: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ākāśadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4257: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4258: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4259: avidyā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4260: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4261: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4262: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. nāmarūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4263: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ṣaḍāyatanaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4264: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4265: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ [ŚsP_II-1_152] prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4266: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tṛṣṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4267: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. upādānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4268: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bhavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4269: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jātiḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4270: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. jarāmaraṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4271: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4272: dānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4273: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śīlapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4274: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. kṣāntipāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4275: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. vīryapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4276: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4277: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prajñāpāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4278: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4279: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4280: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. bahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4281: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4282: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4283: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4284: [ŚsP_II-1_153] yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. paramārthaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4285: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4286: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4287: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. atyantaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4288: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavarāgraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4289: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4290: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4291: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. sarvadharmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4292: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4293: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthity anyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anupalambhaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4294: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4295: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. svabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4296: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4297: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4298: smṛtyupasthānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4299: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samyakprahāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4300: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ṛddhipādā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4301: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. indriyāṇi prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4302: yeṣāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_154] notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. balāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4303: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bodhyaṅgāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4304: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4305: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryasatyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4306: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4307: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. apramāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4308: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4309: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4310: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4311: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4312: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhijñā prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4313: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samādhayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4314: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhāraṇīmukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4315: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. daśatathāgatabalāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4316: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catvāri vaiśāradyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4317: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4318: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāmaitrī prakṛtiśūnyā [ŚsP_II-1_155] yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4319: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. mahākaruṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4320: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4321: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4322: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4402: ye 'nabhisaṃskṛtā na te ṛddhipādāḥ yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:4417: yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni catvāri [ŚsP_II-1_157] vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:4418: yā anabhisaṃskṛtā na tāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4427: tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06sspp2_1u:4428_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_1u:4428_1: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4430: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06sspp2_1u:4432_0: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti. tathā
S06sspp2_1u:4432_1: hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam
S06sspp2_1u:4432_2: anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati. iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś
S06sspp2_1u:4434: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4435: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4436: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃjñā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4437: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4438: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4440: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatranabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotraṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4441: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotraṃ [ŚsP_II-1_158] cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4442: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4443: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4444: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4445: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4447: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4448: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śabdaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā gandhaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4449: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca gandhaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rasaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4450: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rasaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4451: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati,
