S06sspp2_1u:4550_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [ŚsP_II-1_164] nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. svapnopamān
S06sspp2_1u:4550_3: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. māyopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. mārīcyupamān
S06sspp2_1u:4550_4: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratiśrutkopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratibhāsopamān
S06sspp2_1u:4550_5: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:4551: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06sspp2_1u:4553: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4554: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4555: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4556: tasmin samaye saṃjñāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4557: tasmin samaye saṃskārān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārā ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4558: tasmin samaye vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4559: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣur etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4560: tasmin samaye śrotraṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4561: tasmin samaye ghrāṇaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4562: tasmin samaye jihvāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihveyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4563: tasmin samaye kāyaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4564: tasmin samaye mano nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mana etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4565: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4566: tasmin samaye śabdaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4567: tasmin samaye gandhaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandho 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4568: tasmin samaye rasaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati [ŚsP_II-1_165] nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati raso 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4569: tasmin samaye sparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sparśao 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4570: tasmin samaye dharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmā ima iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4571: tasmin samaye cakṣurvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣurvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4572: tasmin samaye śrotravijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotravijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4573: tasmin samaye ghrāṇavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4574: tasmin samaye jihvāvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4575: tasmin samaye kāyavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4576: tasmin samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manovijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4577: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4578: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4579: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4580: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4581: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4582: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4583: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4584: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4585: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4586: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4587: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_166] nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4588: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4589: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4590: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4591: tasmin samaye śīlapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śīlapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4592: tasmin samaye kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kṣāntipāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4593: tasmin samaye vīryapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vīryapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4594: tasmin samaye dhyānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dhyānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4595: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4596: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4597: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati bahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4598: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4599: tasmin samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śūnyatāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4600: tasmin samaye mahāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mahāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4601: tasmin samaye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati paramārthaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4602: tasmin samaye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4603: tasmin samaye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty asaṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4604: tasmin samaye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty atyantaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4605: tasmin samaye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavarāgraśūnyateyam [ŚsP_II-1_167] iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4606: tasmin samaye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavakāraśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4607: tasmin samaye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prakṛtiśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4608: tasmin samaye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sarvadharmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4609: tasmin samaye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svalakṣaṇaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4610: tasmin samaye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anupalambhaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4611: tasmin samaye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4612: tasmin samaye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svabhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4613: tasmin samaye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4614: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtyupasthānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4615: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samyakprahāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4616: tasmin samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati ṛddhipādā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4617: tasmin samaye indriyāṇi nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayatīndriyāṇy etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4618: tasmin samaye balāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati balānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4619: tasmin samaye bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati bodhyaṅgānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4620: tasmin samaye āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryāṣṭaṅgo mārga iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4621: tasmin samaye āryasatyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryasatyāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4622: tasmin samaye dhyānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhyānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4623: tasmin samaye 'pramāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4624: tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4625: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭau vimokṣān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty aṣṭau vimokṣā [ŚsP_II-1_168] ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4626: tasmin samaye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4627: tasmin samaye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4628: tasmin samaye 'bhijñā nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty abhijñā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4629: tasmin samaye samādhīn nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhaya ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4630: tasmin samaye dhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhāraṇīmukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4631: tasmin samaye daśatathāgatabalāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśatathāgatabalānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4632: tasmin samaye catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catvāri vaiśāradyānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4633: tasmin samaye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catasraḥ pratisaṃvida imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4634: tasmin samaye mahāmaitrīṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāmaitrīyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4635: tasmin samaye mahākaruṇāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahākaruṇeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4636: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āveṇikā buddhadharmā eta iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4637_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06sspp2_1u:4637_1: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvasamadhidhāraṇīmukhāṇy etānīti.
S06sspp2_1u:4639: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4743: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4744: iti hi rūpaṃ >; cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4745: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4746: tathā hi bhagavan yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4747: iti hi vedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4748: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4749: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4750: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4751: iti hi saṃjñā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4752: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4753: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4754: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārā,
S06sspp2_1u:4755: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4756: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4757: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4758: tathā hi bhagavan yo vijñānasyānutpādo na te vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4759: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4760: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4761: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ.
S06sspp2_1u:4762: tathā hi yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4763: iti hi cakṣuś [ŚsP_II-1_171] cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4764: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4765: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4766: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:4767: iti hi śrotraṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4768: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4769: tasmād yah śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4770: tathā hi bhagavan ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:4771: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4772: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4773: tasmād yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4774: tathā hi bhagavan jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:4775: iti hi jihvā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4776: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4777: tasmād yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:4778: tathā hi yo bhagavan kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4779: iti hi kāyaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4780: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4781: tathā hi yo bhagavan manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4782: iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4783: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaso nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:4784: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4785: iti hi rūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4786: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4787: yo bhagavan śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4788: iti hi śabdaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4789: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4790: tasmād yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4791: yo bhagavan gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4792: iti hi gandhaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4793: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4794: tasmād yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4796: yo bhagavan rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4797: iti hi rasaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4798: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rasasyānutpādo na so rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4799: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśa,
S06sspp2_1u:4800: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4801: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4802: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4803: yo bhagavan dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4804: iti hi dharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4805: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4806: tasmād yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4807: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4808: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4809: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4810: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4811: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4812: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4813: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4814: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4815: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4816: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4817: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4818: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4819: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4820: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4821: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4822: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4823: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4824: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4825: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4826: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4827: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4828: iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4829: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4830: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_173] yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4831: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4832: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4833: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4834: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4835: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4836: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4837: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4838: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4839: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4840: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4841: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4842: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4843: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na tan jihvāsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4844: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4845: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4846: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4847: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4848: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4849: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4850: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4851: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4852: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4853: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4854: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4855: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4856: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4857: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4858: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4859: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4860: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4861: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda [ŚsP_II-1_174] eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4862: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4863: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4864: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4865: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4866: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4867: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4868: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4869: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4870: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4871: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4872: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4873: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4874: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4875: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4876: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4877: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4878: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4879: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4880: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4881: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4882: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4883: yo bhagavan abdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4884: iti hy abdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4885: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4887: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4888: iti hi tejodhātuś [ŚsP_II-1_175] cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4889: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4890: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4891: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4892: iti hi vāyudhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4893: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4894: tasmād yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4895: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4896: iti hy ākāśadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4897: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4898: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4899: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4900: iti hi vijñānadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4901: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4902: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4903: yo bhagavann avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:4904: iti hy avidyā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4905: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4907: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4908: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4909: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4910: tasmād yo saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4911: yo bhagavan vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4912: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4913: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4914: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4915: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4916: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4917: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4918: tasmād yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4919: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:4920: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4921: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4922: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_176] yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4923: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4924: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4925: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4926: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4927: yo bhagavan vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4928: iti hi vedanāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4929: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4930: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4931: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:4932: iti hi tṛṣṇāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4933: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4934: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,

S06sspp2_1u:5094: tasmād yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5095: yo bhagavann dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5096: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5097: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāny dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5098: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5099: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5100: tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5102: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5103: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5104: tasmād yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5105: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5106: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5107: tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5108: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sa mahāmaitrī iti hi mahāmaitrī cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5109: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5110: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_1u:5111: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5112: iti hi mahākaruṇā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5113: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5114: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5115: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5116: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5117: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5118: yo bhagavan tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5119: iti hi tathatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5120: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5121: tasmād yaḥ tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5122: yo bhagavan dharmatāyā anutpādo na tā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5123: iti hi dharmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5124: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5125: tasmād yo dharmatāyā anutpādo na sā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5126: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5127: iti hi dharmadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5128: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5129: tasmād yo dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5130: yo bhagavan dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na sa dharmaniyāmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5131: iti hi [ŚsP_II-1_183] dharmaniyāmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5132: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5133: tasmād yo dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na ta dharmaniyāmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5134: yo bhagavan bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭir iti hi bhūtakoṭiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5135: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5136: tasmād yo bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5137: yo bhagavann acintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyahātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5138: iti hy acintyadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5139: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5141: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5142: iti hi sarvajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5143: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5144: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5145: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5146: iti hi mārgākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5147: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5148: tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5149: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5150: iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5151: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5152: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_1u:5153: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5154: iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5155: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5156: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5157: iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5158: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5159: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5160: iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5161: tathā hi bhagavan na [ŚsP_II-1_184] vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5162: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5163: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5164: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5165: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5166: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5167: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5168: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5169: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5170: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5171: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5172: iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5173: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5174: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:5175: iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5176: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5177: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5178: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:5179: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5180: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5181: tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5182: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5183: iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5184: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5185: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5186: iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5187: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5188: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5189: iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5190: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5192: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5193: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5194: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5195: iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5196: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5197: tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5198: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5199: iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5200: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5201: tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5202: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5203: iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5204: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5205: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5206: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5207: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5208: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5209: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5210: iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5211: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5212: tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5213: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5214: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5215: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5216: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5217: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5218: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5219: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5220: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5221: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5222: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5223: [ŚsP_II-1_186] tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5224: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5225: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5226: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5227: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5228: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5229: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5230: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5231: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5232: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5233: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5234: iti hi manovijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5235: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5236: tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5237: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5238: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5239: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5240: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5241: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5242: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5243: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5244: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5245: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5246: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5247: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5248: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5249: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5250: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5251: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5252: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5253: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5254: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5255: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5256: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5258: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5259: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5260: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5261: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5262: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5263: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5264: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5265: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5266: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5267: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5268: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5269: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,

S06sspp2_1u:5593: yad ucyate jātir ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,

S06sspp2_1u:5595: yad ucyate dānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5596: yad ucyate śīlapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5597: yad ucyate kṣāntipāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5598: yad ucyate vīryapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasyadharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5599: yad ucyate dhyānapāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5600: yad ucyate prajñāpāramitety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_1u:5601: yad ucyate 'dhyātmaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5602: yad ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5603: yad ucyate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5604: yad ucyate śūnyatāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5605: yad ucyate mahāśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5606: yad ucyate paramārthaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5607: yad ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5608: yad ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5609: yad ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5610: yad ucyate 'navarāgraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5611: yad ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5612: yad ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5613: yad ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatety advayasyā saṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5614: yad ucyate svalakṣaṇaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5615: yad ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5616: yad ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5617: yad ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5618: yad ucyate 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_1u:5619: yad ucyate smṛtyupasthānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5620: yad ucyate samyakprahāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5621: yad ucyate ṛddhipādā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5622: yad ucyate indriyānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5623: yad ucyate balānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya [ŚsP_II-1_199] dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5624: yad ucyate bodhyaṅgānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5625: yad ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5626: yad ucyate āryasatyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5627: yad ucyate dhyānānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5628: yad ucyate 'pramāṇānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5629: yad ucyate ārūpyasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5630: yad ucyate vimokṣā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5631: yad ucyate navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5632: yad ucyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5633: yad ucyate 'bhijñā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5634: yad ucyate samādhaya ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5635: yad ucyate dhāraṇīmukhānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5636: yad ucyate daśatathāgatabalānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5637: yad ucyate catvāri vaiśāradyānīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5638: yad ucyate catasraḥ pratisaṃvida ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5639: yad ucyate mahāmaitrīty advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5640: yad ucyate mahākaruṇety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5641: yad ucyate 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā ity advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5642: yad ucyate sarvajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5643: yad ucyate mārgākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:5644: yad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā iti.
